Title: CNTL Fuel Conservation
Description: An overview on the importance of fuel conservation in the trucking industry.

Title: Breathe Easy
Description: This safety video discusses the potential hazards of grinding dust and welding fumes. It demonstrates the various types of safety equipment available featuring several models of respirators, fans and masks.

Title: Hydraulic Power Tools - Part 1
Description: An overview on the safe use of hydraulic power tools, with the focus on hydraulic hoses and power sources.

Title: Hydraulic Power Tools - Part 2
Description: An overview on the safe use of hydraulic power tools, featuring the Stanley hydraulic spike puller; spike driver, hand tamper; power wrench and rail saw.

Title: Torch Cutting CWR Under Stress
Description: A quick overview of the proper procedures for torch cutting CWR when it is under stress.

Title: Air / Arc Gouging
Description: A demonstration of the Air Carbon Arc gouging process for removing manganese metal from frogs and diamonds - an alternative to grinding.

Title: Rail Seat Abrasion Repair Crew
Description: An overview of a concrete tie rail seat abrasion repair crew - Planning, preparation and procedures, utilizing the Pandrol 730 & 731 process.

Title: Air Dump Cars
Description: This video demonstrates the proper operating procedures for Air Dump cars - specifically - National/Western; Hawker Siddely and Western cars. Covers all aspects of air dump operations including how to avoid an inadvertent multiple dump.

Title: Train Movement Over Rail Breaks
Description: This video looks at the various criteria that CN uses when deciding whether or not to allow train movement over rail breaks. Demonstrates train movement over various rail breaks - without a joint bar; with a joint bar, using both one bolt and four bolts, and with a temporary weld repair bar.

Title: Buried Cable Safety
Description: A look at the consequences of damaging buried cable and the procedures that exist to prevent major disruptions to the operations of both railroads and telecommunications industries.

Title: Brake It To Me Gently - Wheel Spalling
Description: This video explains the phenomena of martensite (wheel spalling) and the consequences of moving rail cars with their brakes applied.

Title: Closure Rail Maintenance For PJT Gangs
Description: Basic closure rail maintenance procedures.

Title: Extra Gang - Reduced Tie Gang
Description: An overview of a reduced tie gang - planning, preparation and procedures.

Title: Extra Gang - Surfacing
Description: An overview of a mechanical surfacing gang - planning, preparation and procedures.

Title: Extra Gang - Ballast Unloading
Description: An overview of a ballast unloading gang - planning, preparation and procedures.

Title: Extra Gang - Rail Train Rail Pick-Up
Description: An overview of a rail pick-up gang using a rail train - planning, preparation and procedures.

Title: Extra Gang - Unloading CWR From A Rail Train
Description: An overview of unloading CWR from a rail train - planning, preparation and procedures.

Title: Extra Gang - Undercutter
Description: An overview of an undercutting gang - planning, preparation and procedures.

Title: Extra Gang - Rail Relay
Description: An overview of a rail relay gang - planning, preparation and procedures.

Title: Extra Gang - Abandonment
Description: An overview of a track abandonment gang - planning, preparation and procedures

Title: Extra Gang - Tie Renewal
Description: An overview of a mechanized wood tie renewal gang - planning, preparation and procedures.

Title: A Chilling Thought - Winter Readiness
Description: A look at some of the many things required of CN's track force to prepare for winter.

Title: Nature's Water Challenge
Description: Examines the destructive power of water to CN's roadbeds.
